attributes.action: Consider 2nd referendum after the lies and deception of the last 'exit' campaign
attributes.additional_details: Just look at the media regarding the tricks and lies of the 'Brexit' campaign.
attributes.background: Parliament to consider a 2nd referendum on 'Brexit' after the lies and deception that has become apparent, and admitted to, after the last referendum. It is the fair thing to do as many 'Leave' voters were duped by these lies. It is not for David Cameron alone to make this decision.
